course_title: Feminist Postcolonial Critique and Journalism in a Digital Age

sections.comments: General seats are restricted to 4th year undergraduate or graduate-level students. If you are interested in enrolling in the course and do not meet the enrolment restriction requirements of the course, please send an email to: soj.grad@ubc.ca. The course will be conducted online. Please await further instructions from the course instructor closer to the start of term. If the course becomes full, please email jrnl.journal@ubc.ca to be added to the Waitlist.

description: Feminist postcolonial critique of journalism, and an examination of underlying democratic ideals in a rapidly evolving media landscape.
